ComicInfo.Summary: New York has always been a melting pot of different people and cultures but now it's become a prime destination for some unsavory characters from the wrong side of Hell. Spawn thinks it's about time he put a stop to that.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-26 16:53:37. [CVDB1002182] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 19:40:30. [Issue ID 2557048]
